goal.en: This course helps students build a complete communication knowledge and establish a good analysis ability for modern communication systems. Main topics include communication signal processing, fundamental communication architecture, OFDM technology, analog front end problems, and the introduction to modern wireless broadband transmission systems.
goal.ch: 為從事新一代通訊系統設計與開發的同學奠定良好現代通訊知識與問題分析能力，主要內容包括基礎通訊訊號處理、通訊架構、OFDM 原理、射頻問題、以及介紹實務的無線寬頻傳輸系統。
